subject: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
Football
lead_paragraph: The New Orleans Saints denied a report that said their general manager’s Superdome suite had been wired to allow him to eavesdrop on opposing coaches from 2002 to 2004.
snippet: The New Orleans Saints denied a report that said their general manager’s Superdome suite had been wired to allow him to eavesdrop on opposing coaches from 2002 to 2004.
